docs.name: carbonatite-derived-carbonate-bearing-fluorapatite-compositions-from-kovdor-sokli-bukusu-catala
docs.title: Carbonatite-derived, carbonate-bearing fluorapatite compositions from Kovdor, Sokli, Bukusu, Catalao II, and Glenover (NERC Grant NE/R013403/1)
docs.notes: Mineralogical data relating to carbonate-bearing fluorapatite from the Bukusu, Catalao II, Sokli, Kovdor and Glenover carboantite complexes.

docs.name: lvmf-protected-vistas2
docs.title: LVMF Protected Vistas
docs.notes: The London View Management Framework (LVMF) protects key views of London from parks or other well-used public spaces that help define London.
docs.validated_data_dict: {"author": null, "author_email": null, "contact-email": "contact@cityoflondon.gov.uk", "creator_user_id": "fe27eda4-4fcf-46e5-8818-5fdb2b0a52f9", "id": "c8c060fb-053c-48sd7ab0", "isopen": false, "license_id": null, "license_title": null, "maintainer": null, "maintainer_email": null, "metadata_created": "2022-04-14T13:23:57.527477", "metadata_modified": "2024-04-30T10:12:56.152696", "name": "lvmf-protected-vistas2", "notes": "The London View Management Framework (LVMF) protects key views of London from parks or other well-used public spaces that help define London. Further details set out in the LVMF Supplementary Planning Guidance March 2012 and the London Plan. The implementation of the Mayor\u2019s LVMF SPG within the context of the City of London is set out in City Pland 2036 Strategic Policy S13: Protected Views and Local Plan Protected Views Policy CS13. To aid assessment of the views data, the Protected Vistas needs to be used with layers:Assessment Points, Heights, Landmarks, Protected Vista Points, Sightlines Polygon layer records all elements of the Viewing Corridor and Wider Setting Consultation Areas for each of the views detailed in the LVMF. Spatial data set out the context of each view within the City of London. See also the Protected Views SPD for further information.Easting & Northing \u2013 Coordinates as specified in the LVMF.View Type \u2013 Records the subset of views as identified in the LVMF \u2013 London Panorama, Linear View, River Prospect or Townscape View.Designated View \u2013 The name of the designated viewpoint as identified in the LVMF.Assessment Point \u2013 The reference code for the viewpoint as identified in the LVMF.View Description \u2013 Text description of the viewpoint as identified in the LVMF.Landmark \u2013 The relevant Landmark feature for those views with a Protected Vista.Ground Level Height \u2013 Measured in metres Above Ordnance Datum (AOD).Camera Height \u2013 Camera height in metres Above Ordnance Datum (AOD) used for photographs from the viewpoint as used in the LVMF.Bearing \u2013 the fixed bearing of the centreline of the view.Protected Vista \u2013 flag for those views with a protected vista.Protected Silhouette - flag for those views with a
